response.original_title: 義理の娘が眩しすぎて。
response.overview: Yuji, who was laid off from his company, lives with his wife Kazuko and her daughter Tomomi. It seems that Tomomi doesn't dislike him as a father, but when he sees his daughter of marriageable age in a defenseless state, Yuji becomes more conscious of it than necessary. As days go by like this, Yuji eats the terrible breakfast made by Kazuko this morning, puts on a suit and goes out. He hadn't told his family that he was laid off. Having failed another job interview today, Yuji is depressed and calls a delivery health girl with money he borrowed from a loan shark. As he waits nervously for the girl in a love hotel room, it turns out to be Tomomi...
response.title: My Daughter-in-Law is Too Dazzling

titles.title: Giri no musume ga mabushi sugite
